title: Vladimir - Pool disappears after Fizz lands his Jump on him
body:
I discovered that Vladimirs Pool just disappears if used at almost the same time as Fizz lands his Jump. Me as a the Vlad-Player could clearly see the animation of the Pool but right after that Jump lands the Pool disappears and Vladimir is in his "normal Form". Sadly the Pool has Cooldown after that Bug so you cant reuse that ability. 

It appeared in these Steps:
-Fizz uses his e and is hovering in the air.
-Vladimir is using his w and therefore goes into the pool
-at the same time Fizz Jumps onto Vladimir with his e
-Vladimir stops going into the pool and can be harmed by fizz.

I hope I described well enough to understand. Sadly I have no footage of that bug, because I did not record that game.
